description.sun-moon:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
description.sword-shield:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.

effect.full: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.shortEffect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
